definitions.definition: An invasive malignant tumour derived from epithelial tissue that tends to metastasize to other areas of the body .
A form of cancer ; ( uncountable ) cancer in general as a disease .

main_definition: ( countable ) An invasive malignant tumour derived from epithelial tissue that tends to metastasize to other areas of the body .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete , countable ) A form of cancer ; ( uncountable ) cancer in general as a disease .
